NAME: hivartOR:mn
DESCRIPTION: ORs of death on TB treatment, (OR HIV+ vs -) x (ART -/+): mean
SOURCE: Jenkins et al 2017, Dodd et al 2017

NAME: hivartOR:sg
DESCRIPTION: ORs of death on TB treatment, (OR HIV+ vs -) x (ART -/+): variance
SOURCE: Jenkins et al 2017, Dodd et al 2017

NAME: s.soc.ptbcov
DESCRIPTION: SAM, SOC: proportion of children considered presumptive

NAME: s.soc.testingcov
DESCRIPTION: SAM, SOC: coverage of any testing among presumptives (rest clinical only)

NAME: s.soc.CXRonly
DESCRIPTION: SAM, SOC: fraction of those with tests only having CXR (as opposed Xpert Ultra on GA as well)

NAME: sens.xga
DESCRIPTION: sensitivity of Xpert on GA in bac+ children

NAME: spec.xga
DESCRIPTION: specificity of Xpert on GA in bac+ children

NAME: sens.clin
DESCRIPTION: SOC, at DH/PHC: sensitivity of clinical diagnosis without CXR

NAME: spec.clin
DESCRIPTION: SOC, at DH/PHC: specificity of clinical diagnosis without CXR

NAME: sens.clinCXR.soc
DESCRIPTION: SOC, at DH/PHC: sensitivity of clinical diagnosis with CXR
SOURCE: 62.7% (59.2-66.1%). Assumed to be the same as Marais 2006

NAME: spec.clinCXR.soc
DESCRIPTION: SOC, at DH/PHC: specificity of clinical diagnosis with CXR
SOURCE: 90.1% (87.8-92.1%). Assumed to be the same as Marais 2006

NAME: s.reassess
DESCRIPTION: SAM: fraction reassessed SOC, WHO, and diagnosed despite score TB Speed

NAME: s.SAMmort
DESCRIPTION: SAM: CFR from SAM applicable to all
